Reviews.Title: 100 ft video cable
Reviews.Author: mpkramer
Reviews.Content: Ordered the cable and it works great! The connectors supplied enable various configurations. I do not have any EMI devices close to cause EMI bleed-over or signal loss. The ends are molded on and all molded to one central break-out area. You won't have much room to spread the ends apart but this wasn't an issue for me, just a heads-up. Well worth the small amount of money I plunked down!

ProductInfo.Features:
2 X 50 feet video/power cables in white
All-in-one video and power cable
BNC connectors and includes 2 BNC/RCA adapters
Plug and Play ready; For camera with DC power only
Output type BNC video connector & 2.1mm power connectors
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 2 X 50 Feet Video Power Cables BNC RCA Wires CCTV Surveillance Security Camera Cords with Bonus BNC RCA Connectors C25
